謖字的基本解释

謖
sù
见“谡”。

謖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sù］
［《廣韻》所六切，入屋，生。］
“谡1”的繁体字。
(1)起立；起。
(2)见“謖爾”、“謖然”。
(3)见“謖謖”。

謖字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　謖； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1175第15
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?所六切，音縮。【爾雅·釋言】起也。【禮·祭統】尸謖君與卿四人餕。【列子·黃帝篇】若夫沒人，則未嘗見舟而謖操之者也。　又謖然，翕斂貌。【後漢·蔡邕傳】公子謖然斂袂而興。　又【字彙補】謖謖，峻挺貌。【世說新語】世目李元禮，謖謖如勁松下風。

[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] All six cuts, phonetic abbreviation. [Erya·Interpretation] Qi Ye. 【Ritual·Sacrifice】The corpse prince and the Qing four gluttons. 【Liezi·Huangdi Chapter】If there is no husband, then there is no one who has seen the boat and is slanderous.　Randomly again, sturdy appearance. [Later Han·Cai Yong Biography] The son was eagerly excited.　[Word Supplement] Yeah, handsome and handsome. [Shi Shuo Xin Yu] Li Yuanli, the head of the world, is like a strong pine wind.
